description:
Shichimiya Satone was http://anidb.net/ch39997 [Yuuta]`s middle school classmate. Although she considered Yuuta to be her only true friend, she ended up transferring schools without saying goodbye during their second middle school year.
She suffers from delusions and calls herself Sophia Ring SP Saturn VII and addresses Yuuta with the nickname Yuusha.
Source: wiki
name: Shichimiya Satone
